title: [K-12] Short-term Intensive Course for Innovating Math Lecture Delivery via Text-to-Speech (TTS) Technology

context.prior_knowledge: Understanding of basic mathematical concepts and proficiency in fundamental online learning tools
context.additional_context: Acquiring methods for delivering math lectures using TTS technology in smartphone-centric environments and applying them to real-time online classes

learning_goals: Voice explanations for math lecture slides can be produced with over 90% accuracy using TTS technology
Three or more instructional methods can be applied by combining TTS-based materials with videos/animations in real-time online sessions
Two or more strategies to address accessibility issues of TTS lecture materials in smartphone environments can be designed and implemented

constraints.tech_requirements: Limited tech environment (no PC, smartphone only)

difficulty: Easy - Simple structure with minimal constraints
